structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases

law.catch_line: Assault And Battery Upon A Child; Penalties

text.section: For the purposes of this section, the following words shall, unless the context indicates otherwise, have the following meanings:â€”

Whoever commits an assault and battery upon a child and by such assault and battery causes bodily injury shall be punished by imprisonment in the state prison for not more than five years or imprisonment in the house of correction for not more than two and one-half years.
